abstract: It’s when you need to borrow money that you find out who your friends are. China sold $34 billion worth of United States Treasury Securities in December, and The Daily Telegraph of London thinks this is no coincidence.
snippet: It’s when you need to borrow money that you find out who your friends are. China sold $34 billion worth of United States Treasury Securities in December, and The Daily Telegraph of London thinks this is no coincidence.
lead_paragraph: It’s when you need to borrow money that you find out who your friends are. China sold $34 billion worth of United States Treasury securities in December, and The Daily Telegraph of London thinks this is no coincidence.

headline.main: The Other Debt Story: U.S. Treasuries and China
